mapper.sql: id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, code, name, value, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, ext01, ext02, ext03
mapper.update: update insure_dict set code=#{code},name=#{name},value=#{value} where id=#{id} and hosp_code =#{hospCode}
mapper.delete: delete from insure_dict where id=#{id} and hosp_code =#{hospCode}
mapper.select: select * from insure_dict where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and id=#{id}
select count(*) from insure_dict where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and code=#{code} and value =#{value} and insure_reg_code =#{insureRegCode} and id !=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from insure_dict where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and insure_reg_code=#{regCode}

and (admdvs_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or admdvs_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
select admdvs_code admdvsCode, admdvs_name admdvsName from insure_admdvs where hosp_code = #{hospCode}
select admdvs_code admdvsCode, admdvs_name admdvsName from insure_admdvs where hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND admdvs_code = #{admdvsCode}

SELECT a.name, a.value from sys_code b join sys_code_detail a on b.code = a.c_code and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.is_valid = '1' where b.is_valid = '1' and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND b.code = #{code}
